hero.title: Track Your Baby's Feeding with Ease
hero.subtitle: Simplify and Monitor Your Baby's Feeding Schedule
features.share.title: Share with Caregivers
features.share.subtitle: Easily share your child’s feeding information with other caregivers, such as your spouse, nanny, or grandparents. With just a few taps, you can grant access to your child’s feeding log, ensuring everyone involved is up-to-date and coordinated.
features.track.title: Comprehensive Feeding Logs
features.track.subtitle: Effortlessly track both breast and bottle feeding sessions. For breastfeeding, use a simple timer for each side to log the duration. For bottle feeding, record the amount of milk consumed with an intuitive slider. Keep all your feeding data in one place for easy reference.
features.input.title: Practical follow-up
features.input.subtitle: Maintain a detailed log of all feeding sessions, complete with timestamps and amounts. This comprehensive log helps you monitor patterns, identify any issues, and ensure your baby is getting the nutrition they need. Access past records anytime to review and analyze your baby’s feeding history.
policies.title: Your Privacy Matters to Us
policies.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your data. We do not sell or share your information with third parties. Our app is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive, with a focus on safeguarding your personal information.
cgu.title: Terms of use
cgu.one.title: 1. Introduction
cgu.one.body: Welcome to Materne. These Terms of Use ("Terms") govern your use of our mobile application (the "App") and any related services (the "Service") provided by [Your Company Name] ("we," "us," or "our"). By downloading, accessing, or using the App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the App.
cgu.two.title: 2. Account Registration
cgu.two.one.title: 2.1. Account Creation
cgu.two.one.body: To access and use the App, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during the registration process and to keep your account information up to date.
cgu.two.two.title: 2.2. Account Security
cgu.two.two.body: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
cgu.three.title: 3. Privacy
cgu.three.body: Your use of the App is also governed by our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Terms by reference. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand our practices.
cgu.four.title: 4. Intellectual Property
cgu.four.body: All content, features, and functionality of the App, including text, graphics, logos, and software, are the exclusive property of [Your Company Name] or its licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
cgu.five.title: 5. Termination
cgu.five.body: We may terminate or suspend your access to the App at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the App will immediately cease.
cgu.six.title: 6. Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability
cgu.six.one.title: 6.1 Disclaimer of Warranties
cgu.six.one.body: The App is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
cgu.six.two.title: 6.2 Limitation of Liability
cgu.six.two.body: In no event shall Materne be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your use of the App; (ii) any unauthorized access to or use of our servers and/or any personal information stored therein; (iii) any interruption or cessation of transmission to or from the App; (iv) any bugs, viruses, trojan horses, or the like that may be transmitted to or through the App by any third party; or (v) any errors or omissions in any content or for any loss or damage incurred as a result of the use of any content posted, emailed, transmitted, or otherwise made available through the App, whether based on warranty, contract, tort, or any other legal theory, and whether or not we have been advised of the possibility of such damages.
cgu.seven.title: 7. Changes to These Terms
cgu.seven.body: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page. You are advised to review these Terms periodically for any changes. Changes to these Terms are effective when they are posted on this page.
cgu.eight.title: 8. Contact Us
cgu.eight.body: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us in the feedback section.
pp.title: Privacy Policy
pp.one.title: 1. Introduction
pp.one.body: Welcome to Materne. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application (the "App"). Please read this Privacy Policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this Privacy Policy, please do not use the App.
pp.two.title: 2. Information We Collect
pp.two.one.title: 2.1 Personal Information
pp.two.one.body: When you create an account to use the App, we collect personal information that you provide to us, such as your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.
pp.two.two.title: 2.2 Baby's Feeding Data
pp.two.two.body: The primary purpose of the App is to track your baby's feeding data. This may include information such as feeding times, types of food, quantities, and other related details.
pp.two.three.title: 2.3 Automatically Collected Information
pp.two.three.body: When you use the App, we may collect certain information automatically, including your device type, operating system, and usage details such as access times and pages viewed.
pp.three.title: 3. Use of Your Information
pp.three.body: We use the information we collect to: Provide, maintain, and improve the App. Communicate with you about your account or the App. Personalize your experience and provide content and features that match your preferences.
pp.four.title: 4. Data Retention
pp.four.body: We will retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with the App's services. If you delete your account, all related data will be anonymized in our database, meaning it will no longer be associated with you.
pp.five.title: 5. Data Sharing and Disclosure
pp.five.body: We will never sell your personal information or any data related to your baby's feeding to any third parties. We may share your information only in the following situations: With your consent. To comply with legal obligations. To protect and defend our rights and property. To prevent or investigate possible wrongdoing in connection with the App. To protect the personal safety of users of the App or the public.
pp.six.title: 6. Data Security
pp.six.body: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that despite our efforts, no security measures are perfect or impenetrable, and no method of data transmission can be guaranteed against any interception or other type of misuse.
pp.seven.title: 7. Your Rights
pp.seven.one.title: 7.1 Account Deletion
pp.seven.one.body: You have the right to delete your account at any time. Deleting your account will anonymize all related data in our database.
pp.seven.two.title: 7.2 Access and Correction
pp.seven.two.body: You can access and update your personal information through your account settings in the App. If you have any issues accessing or updating your information, please contact us.
pp.seven.three.title: 7.3 Opt-Out
pp.seven.three.body: You may opt-out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions in those communications or by contacting us.
pp.eight.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
pp.eight.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
pp.nine.title: 9. Contact Us
pp.nine.body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [your contact information].
